title: Making further continuing appropriations for fiscal year 2014, and for other purposes.
short_title: Making further continuing appropriations for fiscal year 2014, and for other purposes.
summary: (This measure has not been amended since it was introduced. The summary of that version is repeated here.) Amends the Continuing Appropriations Act, 2014 (P.L. 113-46) to extend through January 18, 2014, specified continuing appropriations for FY2014.
summary_short: (This measure has not been amended since it was introduced. The summary of that version is repeated here.) Amends the Continuing Appropriations Act, 2014 (P.L. 113-46) to extend through January 18, 2014, specified continuing appropriations for FY2014.

actions.description: Message on Senate action sent to the House.
Passed Senate without amendment by Yea-Nay Vote. 86 - 14. Record Vote Number: 11.
Measure laid before Senate by unanimous consent. (consideration: CR S343-344)
Received in the Senate, read twice.
On motion to suspend the rules and pass the resolution Agreed to by voice vote. (text: CR H198)
DEBATE - The House proceeded with forty minutes of debate on H.J. Res. 106.
Considered under suspension of the rules. (consideration: CR H198)
Mr. Rogers (KY) moved to suspend the rules and pass the resolution.
Referred to the House Committee on Appropriations.
